description: A domain, which is a container for all case data, such as cases, fields, templates and layouts. Each Amazon Connect instance can be associated with only one Cases domain.

DomainStatus.description: The current status of the Cases domain. Indicates whether the domain is Active, CreationInProgress, or CreationFailed.
DomainStatus.markdownDescription:
The current status of the Cases domain. Indicates whether the domain is Active, CreationInProgress, or CreationFailed.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Active | CreationInProgress | CreationFailed  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedTime.description: The time at which the domain was created.
CreatedTime.markdownDescription:
The time at which the domain was created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

DomainArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Cases domain.
DomainArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Cases domain.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

DomainId.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.
DomainId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Name.description: The name for your Cases domain. It must be unique for your AWS account.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name for your Cases domain. It must be unique for your AWS account.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^.*[\S]$  
Update requires: Replacement
